TextEng: How do you know my name?
Who are you?
I've decided to take your evil head as a trophy, Wyrm!
Text: 네 사악한 머리를 전리품으로 가져가기로 했다, 고룡이여!

TextEng: I want to ask you some questions.
I'll be going now.
Stuff it you old windbag! You're dragon meat!
Text: 입 다물어 이 늙은 허풍쟁이! 네가 용 고기가 될 거야!

TextEng: I'm ready to face my death, Klauth. Are you?
Text: 죽음을 맞이할 준비는 됐어, 클라우스. 넌?

TextEng: Tell me about the Words of Power.
Tell me about the Creator Race.
Do you know anything about Maugrim and his cult?
Text: 모그림과 그의 사교에 대해 아는 게 있어?

TextEng: What's wrong with the dragon in the other lair within this complex?
Text: 이 단지 안의 다른 소굴에 있는 용은 뭐가 문제야?

TextEng: You feed on your own kind. You're a monstrous cannibal!
Text: 네 동족을 잡아먹다니. 넌 괴물 같은 식인종이야!

TextEng: I think you're an insane egomaniac.
I have an essence sphere here.
Forget it, I'm not striking a deal with you!
Trade? What kind of trade?
What do you mean, too much to lose?
Text: 잃을 게 너무 많다니, 무슨 말이야?

TextEng: Maybe I could do this task for you.
Text: 내가 그 일을 해줄 수도 있어.

TextEng: What if I just decide to destroy this essence sphere?
Text: 이 정수 구체를 그냥 부숴버리면 어떻게 될까?

TextEng: Gold? I was hoping for some other reward. A powerful magic item, perhaps?
Text: 금화? 다른 보상을 바랐는데. 강력한 마법 물품 같은 거?

TextEng: How do I use this sphere?
I'll be back as soon as I get this sphere filled up!
Here, take the orb.
What if I decide to destroy the orb instead?
Text: 그 구슬을 대신 부숴버리면 어떻게 될까?

TextEng: I was hoping for a more substantial reward than gold. A powerful magic item, perhaps?
Text: 금화보다 더 실질적인 보상을 바랐는데. 강력한 마법 물품 같은 거?

TextEng: Wait, I've reconsidered. Tell me your offer.
Where can I find these dragon eggs?
Text: 용의 알은 어디서 찾을 수 있어?

TextEng: How do I know I can trust you?
I'll be back as soon as I have these dragon eggs!
I'll think about your offer, but right now I have some more questions for you.
Text: 제안은 생각해볼게, 근데 지금은 질문이 좀 더 있어.

TextEng: No, I do not have the eggs yet.
I have the eggs of a dragon right here.
How do you know so much about me?
Text: 나에 대해 어떻게 그렇게 많이 알아?

TextEng: I want to ask you some questions.
Take the eggs.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> I think I deserve a little something extra for these eggs.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 이 알에 대해 좀 더 받을 자격이 있는 것 같은데.

TextEng: Then I think I'll just keep these eggs for myself, Klauth!
Text: 그럼 이 알은 내가 가져야겠어, 클라우스!

TextEng: Fine, take the eggs.
I have some more dragon's eggs for you.
Here, take the eggs.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> I think I deserve a little more than 5000 gold.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 금화 5000개보다 더 받을 자격이 있는 것 같은데.

TextEng: Fine, take the eggs.
Then I think I'll just keep these eggs for myself!
Me got more dragon egg here.
You take eggs.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Not enough! Me want more gold!
Me keep eggs for meself!
Me got essence ball.
Me want ask question.
Me want kill dragon now!
Me go now.
How you know name?
Who be you?
Tell 'bout Power Word.
Tell 'bout Creator Race.
You know 'bout Maugrim and him cult?
How you know 'bout me?
What be wrong with dragon in other room?
Me not deal with you!
Trade? What you mean?
Me change mind. Tell 'bout deal.
No, me not got eggs.
Me got eggs here.
Where me find dragon egg?
How me know trust you?
Me be back with eggs!
Me we want ask more question.
What you mean, too much lose?
You be dragon who eat other dragon? Why you eat own kind?
Text: 너 다른 용 먹는 용이야? 왜 동족 먹어?

TextEng: Me think you crazy!
Here, you take ball.
What if me want break ball?
Me want more. You give strong magic item, maybe?
Text: 나 더 원해. 강한 마법 물건 줄래?

TextEng: Maybe me could do task?
What if me just break ball?
Me want more. Maybe you give big magic item?
Text: 나 더 원해. 큰 마법 물건 줄래?

TextEng: How me use ball?
Me be back when ball be full with dragon!
You talk too much. You boring. You die!
Text: 너 말 너무 많아. 지루해. 죽어!

TextEng: Me not scared to die. What 'bout you, dragon?
Text: 나 죽는 거 안 무서워. 너는, 용?

TextEng: You take eggs.
<StartCheck>[Persuade]</Start> Me should get more. Me work hard to get eggs.
Text: <StartCheck>[설득]</Start> 나 더 받아야 해. 나 알 구하려고 열심히 일했어.
